name: The Starry Night Level 1 (Village)
description:
This is the 2nd project for Gaming Design Class. This is the first part/level of a group effort, in which all of our levels are based on The Starry Night. Mine is the first level (the Village). The premise of the game is that you play a character named Sirius and your objective is to find all the constellation pieces in order to progress through the maze. 

If you have to happen to get a game over, just exit out of the game and start over from there.

Overall, I hope you have fun and enjoy the levels our group have created. 

Starry Night Mazes by Colwyn Bordeaux (itch.io)

Starless Night by hannahthemess (itch.io)
